example.parse: TOP (S (S (CONJ وَ) (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ إِن) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS جَلَس) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN الأَشِقّاء))))) (VP (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P تَحابُّوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-PRP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC إكراماً)) (PP (PREP لِ) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN الأَخّ)) (NP (ADJ مُطْلِق) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG المُبادْرَة)))))) (PUNC ,)
